divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a pinpoint flash in the distance over these trees in an area where I have taken numerous photo's of ufo's before, so I took a picture and then another , and caught ufo's in both. I have posted it at fdinwidy7.tripod.com along with others from the same area. It seems that activity has increased in all areas where I film over the past week. I then went over across the parking lot to a Sheriff sitting in his car to ask him about things flying over without really divulging anything and only after he elaborated on his own experiences did I show him the pictures on my camera. He went on to tell me that he has seen many things unexplained over this area of Pearisburg.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Pearisburg
There were no other sightings in Pearisburg on or around October 12th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Saw a Bright flash like a small reflection then took picture of the area.
